short_summary: Parks Canada located in Banff, Alberta, Canada seeks  defensive bear sprays and holsters to be supplied and delivered.
description: Parks Canada located in Banff, Alberta, Canada seeks  defensive bear sprays and bear spray holsters, as required, submitted by October 5, 2022.    All bids submitted after 14:00 EDT  October 5, 2022, will be declared non-responsive.
tags: Government of Canada,   fiscal sponsor,   Alberta,   Canada

### Tender Description

The Government of Canada (Department of Public Works and Government Services) invites qualified suppliers to submit a bid for the supply and delivery of defensive bear attack sprays and holsters to meet the needs of Parks Canada located in Banff, Alberta, Canada. The request for a Regional Individual Standing Offer (RIOS) includes the establishment of a contract for procurement services.

### Important Tender Information

* Deadline
